Posts.Content: slewis13 wrote: I had a mammo and they wanted a ultrasound.  Well I am a nurse so I was able to get my results quickly and here is what it says. "There is dense islands of fibroglandular tissue present in the right breast" There is a palable oval shaped echogenic solid nodule in the (R) breast measuring 2.2x1.1x2.0 cm. there is small echogenic nodule at 12 o clock position measuring approx 6x3x4mm there is a second echogenic nodule i the right medial breast breast measuring 4x3x3 mm and a third echogenic nodules in the right lateral lower breast measuring approx 3x3x3mm.  these echogenic nodules appear to be fatty in etiology. "" Conclusion: surgical consult and biospy recommended I am very worried and I cant see anyone until 6/22.  I am very worried.  I am a medical person so I want and need the truth.  Do you all think this is bad?
